titleStmt.title: A declaration of divers elders and brethren of congregationall societies, in and about the city of London. Decrying and disclaiming two bookes; one called a cry; and the other book called A model of a new representative. Wherein their judgements touching the qualifications of electors, and eligible persons, are tendered to consideration, in way of vindication of themselves from unjust aspersions.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons for L. Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
